item.description:
Good Morning!

I've wanted to try Cracker Barrel for a long time, so today is the day!  Here is just a sample of their oh-so-scrumptious menu!

http://www.crackerbarrel.com/menu-pancakes.cfm?doc_id=890

Just look in the upper left hand column for other menu items.

I know this is an early start, but since this place is really popular and also located on a busy road, early is better in this case in order to avoid the traffic hassles and long waits.  Besides, a great breakfast like this and a chance to socialize with some super people, will make it worth getting up early for:)

We'll meet in the parking lot; just look for my silver Subaru Forester right before 08:30. 

Randy

Please remember, RSVP yes only if you plan to attend to allow us to make reservations. If you RSVP yes and change your mind on attending, you MUST provide at least 24 hours notice or you will be considered a "No Show". After 2 "no shows" to restaurant meetups, you will no longer be allowed to attend restaurant meetups.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for silver Subaru Forester in the parking lot at around 8:30. After that, we will be inside.
item.name: Cracker Barrel May Day Breakfast Social!
